SKT_FIRST.name: Kaizer Knuckle
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. Obtains <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>Kaizer Energy (Unique Resource)</color> if used during the caster's turn.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases Critical Chance of Burst Skill by 100%
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: バーストスキルの会心率+100%

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Reduces Noa Kaizer X Cooldown by 2 turns
SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: 【ノアカイザーX】スキルターン-2ターン

SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 【ノアカイザーX】スキルターン初期化

description: Attacks an enemy. Obtains <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000022_1_1]</color> <color=#28d9ed>Kaizer Energy (Unique Resource)</color> if used during the caster's turn.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 자신의 턴이라면 <color=#28d9ed>고유 자원 : 카이저 에너지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 획득합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、自分のターンの場合<color=#28d9ed>【固有資源:カイザーエナジー】</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>獲得する。

SKT_SECOND.name: Kaizer Cannon
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Triggered Effect) If <color=#28d9ed>Kaizer Knuckle</color> scores a critical hit during the caster's turn, activates <color=#28d9ed>Kaizer Cannon</color> as an additional attack. Attacks all enemies, dealing damage proportional to the target's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>. Obtains <color=#28d9ed>1</color> additional <color=#28d9ed>Kaizer Energy (Unique Resource)</color>.
description: (Triggered Effect) If <color=#28d9ed>Kaizer Knuckle</color> scores a critical hit during the caster's turn, activates <color=#28d9ed>Kaizer Cannon</color> as an additional attack. Attacks all enemies, dealing damage proportional to the target's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>. Obtains <color=#28d9ed>1</color> additional <color=#28d9ed>Kaizer Energy (Unique Resource)</color>.

3: Increases damage proportional to the target's Max Health
5: Increases damage proportional to the target's Max Health
3_jp: 対象の最大HPが高いほどダメージUP
3_kr: 대상 최대 체력 비례 피해 증가
5_jp: 対象の最大HPが高いほどダメージUP
5_kr: 대상 최대 체력 비례 피해 증가

SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (발동 효과) 자신의 턴에 <color=#28d9ed>카이저 너클</color> 스킬이 치명 공격으로 적중하면 추가타로 <color=#28d9ed>카이저 캐논</color> 스킬을 발동합니다. 적 전체를 공격하고 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>최대 체력</color>이 높을수록 피해가 증가합니다. <color=#28d9ed>고유 자원 : 카이저 에너지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 더 획득합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (発動効果)自分のターンに<color=#28d9ed>【カイザーナックル】</color>で会心が発生した場合、追加で<color=#28d9ed>【カイザーキャノン】</color>を発動し、<color=#28d9ed>【固有資源:カイザーエナジー】</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>獲得する。<color=#28d9ed>【カイザーキャノン】</color>:敵全体にダメージを与え、対象の<color=#28d9ed>最大HP</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Noa Kaizer X
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. Increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>. When <color=#28d9ed>Kaizer Energy (Unique Resource)</color> owned is <color=#28d9ed>5</color>, consumes all to increase damage dealt proportional to the target's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies. Increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Critical Hit Chance</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000022_3_1] turn(s)</color>. When <color=#28d9ed>Kaizer Energy (Unique Resource)</color> owned is <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000022_3_2]</color>, consumes all to increase damage dealt proportional to the target's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.

3: Increases damage proportional to the target's Max Health
5: Increases damage proportional to the target's Max Health
3_jp: 対象の最大HPが高いほどダメージUP
3_kr: 대상 최대 체력 비례 피해 증가
5_jp: 対象の最大HPが高いほどダメージUP
5_kr: 대상 최대 체력 비례 피해 증가

SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고, 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>치명 확률</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 증가시킵니다. <color=#28d9ed>고유 자원 : 카이저 에너지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>5개</color> 보유 시, 모두 소모하여 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>최대 체력</color>에 비례하여 피해량이 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、自分の<color=#28d9ed>会心率</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせる。\n\n<color=#28d9ed>【固有資源:カイザーエナジー】</color>が<color=#28d9ed>5個</color>ある場合、すべて消費してダメージを与える。このダメージは対象の<color=#28d9ed>最大HP</color>が高いほどUPする。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: Generates <color=#28d9ed>2.5%</color> Chain Points after attacking.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: The damage increases proportional to the target's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: Generates <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000022_chain_1_1]</color> Chain Points after attacking.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: The damage increases proportional to the target's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>25</color>의 CP를 회복합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>최대 체력</color>이 높을수록 피해량이 증가합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後<color=#28d9ed>25</color>のCPを回復する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:対象の<color=#28d9ed>最大HP</color>が高いほどダメージがUPする。
